statements: SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT symbol, date, volume FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM market_data WHERE open_price > close_price;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price, volume FROM market_data WHERE date>'2022-01-01' AND date<'2022-01-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT symbol FROM market_data WHERE volume>1000000 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT date, symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE close_price>1000 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(close_price), MAX(high_price), MIN(low_price) FROM market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'MSFT');
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price FROM market_data
SELECT symbol, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM market_data
SELECT * FROM volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.05
SELECT date, symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT symbol, date, volatility FROM volatility_data ORDER BY volatility DESC
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE open_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price DESC
SELECT symbol, volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.05 ORDER BY volatility ASC
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY date
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol='GOOGL' AND (close_price - open_price) > 10 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM market_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, volume FROM market_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT trend_type, trend_date FROM price_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT symbol, daily_volatility, weekly_volatility FROM volatility_data ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE volume > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM price_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' AND trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT symbol, MONTH(timestamp) AS month, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' GROUP BY symbol, month ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT symbol, daily_volatility, weekly_volatility, monthly_volatility FROM volatility_data WHERE daily_volatility > 0.5 OR monthly_volatility < 0.2;
SELECT symbol, trend_type, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM price_trends GROUP BY symbol, trend_type HAVING trend_count > 5 ORDER BY symbol, trend_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT date, close_price FROM historical_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM historical_prices GROUP BY ticker_symbol
SELECT * FROM volatility_index ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol_id, symbol_name FROM market_symbols
SELECT date, close_price FROM historical_prices WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT MAX(open_price), MIN(close_price) FROM historical_prices;
SELECT date, high_price, low_price FROM historical_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT symbol_name, trend_name FROM market_symbols JOIN market_trends ON market_symbols.symbol_id = market_trends.trend_id;
SELECT symbol_name, trend_description FROM market_symbols JOIN market_trends ON market_symbols.symbol_id = market_trends.trend_id WHERE trend_name LIKE '%bull%' ORDER BY symbol_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, trend_category, start_date FROM PriceTrends WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM Volatility WHERE volatility_rate > 4.0 AND volatility_category = 'High' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, region FROM MarketParticipants WHERE participant_type = 'Institutional Investor' AND region = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM MarketData ORDER BY date DESC, symbol ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, MAX(close_price) AS max_close_price FROM MarketData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY symbol;

SELECT MarketData.symbol, MarketParticipants.participant_name, MarketParticipants.region FROM MarketData INNER JOIN MarketParticipants ON MarketData.symbol = MarketParticipants.participant_type WHERE MarketParticipants.region = 'Europe';
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MarketData GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
